text: Jya lokanna tauratanusara kama karanyaca adesa dila gela, parantu tyanni to amalata anala nahi, tyance udaharana tya gadhavasarakhe ahe jyane (pathivara) aneka grantha ladalele asaveta.1 Allahacya ayatinna yala khote tharavinaryance phara va'ita udaharana ahe ani allaha asa julami lokanna margadarsana karita nahi
